game.title: Echoes of Eternity
game.synopsis: In a world where time has broken, fragments of memories and moments from different eras collide. Players take on the role of a temporal archaeologist tasked with uncovering the source of this anomaly.
game.beginning: The game begins in a desolate, post-apocalyptic landscape where ancient ruins hold secrets to the past. The protagonist awakens with no memory, only to discover a cryptic message etched into their skin: 'Find the Echoes of Eternity'.
game.ending: As players navigate through various timelines and realities, they eventually stumble upon an ancient temple holding the key to repairing time. However, this solution comes at a terrible cost: erasing all memories of the events that transpired, leaving only the faint echo of their existence behind.
